elements.contents:
Abracadabra - REKT
Wednesday, January 31, 2024

Abracadabra - MIM - REKT

On-chain black magic led to two of Abracadabra’s cauldrons springing a leak yesterday. $6.5M gone and MIM losing its magic... What dark arts are needed for a full repeg?

MORE

Socket - REKT
Wednesday, January 17, 2024

Socket - Bungee - Bridge - REKT

Infinite approvals… the ultimate leap of faith. Socket’s Bungee bridge lost $3.3M yesterday. Have you checked your approvals lately?

MORE

Gensler's Grand Gaffe
Wednesday, January 10, 2024

SEC - Regulation

A fitting regulator for our circus of an industry. Yesterday, the SEC’s official Twitter account was compromised, announcing the approval of Bitcoin ETFs. Will the SEC investigate itself?

MORE

Gamma Strategies - REKT
Thursday, January 4, 2024

Gamma Strategies - Arbitrum - REKT

Gamma Strategies, an Arbitrum-based concentrated liquidity management protocol, was exploited for at least $4.5M, earlier today. Recently we wondered, "Can we do better this year?". So far, it’s not looking good.

MORE

Orbit Bridge - REKT
Wednesday, January 3, 2024

Orbit Bridge - Bridge - REKT

It wasn’t just fireworks blowing up on New Year’s Eve... Orbit Chain’s Ethereum bridge lost $81.5M. What will 2024 bring?

MORE

Radiant Capital - REKT
Wednesday, January 3, 2024

Radiant Capital - Fork - REKT

2024 is off to a bright start... Lending protool Radiant Capital lost $4.5M, to a known bug. Keeping up with the security landscape is key, especially when dealing with forked code.

MORE

Levana Protocol - REKT
Friday, December 29, 2023

Levana Protocol - Osmosis - REKT

Gradually, then all at once. Levana Protocol lost over $1.1M to an oracle manipulation attack lasting almost two weeks. But if it hadn’t been for congestion, would they have even noticed?

MORE

Money for nothing?
Thursday, December 28, 2023

MEV - Uniswap - REKT

The cost of doing business? 98%. $1.3M was lost yesterday when a Uniswap V3 whale LP made a costly fat-finger error. Who deserves the spoils?

MORE

Ape Season Returns
Thursday, December 21, 2023

Ape Szn - Ledger - Thirdweb

The apes are out of their cages once more, but familiar dangers are ever-present. Each innovation spawns new ways to get rekt but, despite the risks, opportunity certainly is out there.

MORE

Hypr Network - REKT
Thursday, December 14, 2023

Hypr Network - Bridge - REKT

What is this, a bridge hack for ants? Yesterday, Hypr Network lost $220k to a bridge exploit. Forking code can be risky, especially when devs aren't up to date with issues in the source.

MORE

OKX DEX - REKT
Wednesday, December 13, 2023

OKX - REKT

CeDeFi strikes again. OKX’s DEX aggregator has fallen victim to one of the oldest tricks in the book, losing $2.7M to a private key compromise. If the compromised contract was deprecated, why did they wait until it got rekt?

MORE

Plenty of Phish
Wednesday, December 6, 2023

Phishing - Scams

The tide may be turning, but crypto’s waters remain as treacherous as ever. Our latest phishing roundup covers the latest tackle and the most tempting lures. Will you take the bait?

MORE
